title: Episode 121: The Murder of Sarah Stern Mini Morbid
description:
Tonight in an Ash-centric Mini Morbid, we dive into the tragic case of Sarah Stern who was brutally murdered by her best friend Liam McAtasney. How far will someone go for money?
